column2: "Afei aber a Modekai hun dza aba nyinara no
column4: na ɔdze eyitam nye nso kataa noho
column5: na ofiir edzi kɔr kurow no ne finimfin
column6: na ɔdze nkekamu dzendzen a ɔyɛ wen sui:"

column2: "na ɔkɔr ɔhen no no kuropon no enyim mpo: osiandɛ obiara nnyi ho kwan dɛ ofura eyitam dze hɛn ɔhen no no kuropon mu."
"Na ɔmansin biara mu beebiara mbrɛ ɔhen ne mbrasɛm no durii no
column3: nkɔmbɔdzi kɛse baa hɔ wɔ Jewfo no mu
column7: na dodowara dedaa eyitam na nso mu."

column2: "Na Ester ne mbabaawa na ne mpiafo no bae bɛkaa kyerɛɛ no; na ɔhembaa no no werɛ hoow mbordo: na ɔsomaa dɛ wɔmfa atar nkɛhyɛ Modekai
column3: na wonyi eyitam wɔ no ho: naaso ɔanngye."
ɔhen n'epiafo no mu baako a woeyi no dɛ ɔnhwɛ no no
column4: na ɔsomaa no dɛ ɔnkɔ Modekai nkyɛn."

column2: "Nna Hatihak fiir edzi kɔr Modekai nkyɛn wɔ kurow no ne bea tɛtɛr no a ɔwɔ ɔhen no kuropon enyim no do."
"Na Modekai kaa dza aba no do nyinara kyerɛɛ no
column3: na sika dodow a Haman abɔ anohoba dɛ osian Jewfo ntsi obeker egu ɔhen n'akoradze mu

column2: "Eso ɔdze mbra no a wɔhyɛɛ no wɔ Susa dɛ wɔnsɛɛ hɔn no ne kyerɛw saso maa no
column3: dɛ ɔmfa nkyerɛ Ester na ɔnka nkyerɛ no; na ɔnhyɛ no dɛ ɔnkɔ ɔhen nkyɛn
column4: nkɔtotɔ nserɛ no na ombisa adze wɔ n'enyim mma ne man."

column2: "Na Hatihak bae bɛkaa Modekai ne nsɛm no kyerɛɛ Ester."

column3: na ɔmaa no nkra wɔ Modekai nkyɛn
na ɔhen n'amansin mu nkorɔfo nyinara
column7: ɔbɛba ɔhen nkyɛn wɔ fie afamu abanguado a wɔammfrɛ no no
column8: mbra kor pɛr na ɔwɔ hɔ ma no
column10: gyedɛ nyia ɔhen bɛtsen sika ahempoma akyerɛ no dɛ ɔntsena ase no: na wɔmmfrɛɛ me dɛ monkɔ ɔhen nkyɛn adaduasa yi."

column2: "Na wɔkɛkaa Ester ne nsɛm no dze kyerɛɛ Modekai."
"Nna Modekai hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmfa mbuae nsan nkɛma Ester dɛ
column3: Mma nsusu wo tsirmu dɛ ɔwo befi mu efi wɔ ahemfie

column2: "Na sɛ ɔwo imua w'ano koraa wɔ aber yi mu a
column3: ɔnodze mboa na ɔgye bɔsoɛr efi beebi fofor so ama Jewfo
column4: na ɔwo na w'egya fi dze wɔbɛsɛɛ: na woana na onyim dɛ aber a ɔtse dɛm yi ntsi na wo nsa aka ahendzi no?"

column2: "Nna Ester kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn dɛ wonkobua Modekai dɛ
column5: kɔpon Jewfo a wohu hɔn wɔ Susa nyinara hyia
column6: na hom ndzi mbuada wɔ me ntsi
column7: na mma hom nndzidzi na wɔnnom so ndaansa
column8: adzesaa na adzekyee: emi so na me mbabaawa so bedzi mbuada dɛmara; na medze no dɛm akɔ ɔhen nkyɛn a ɔnnam mbra kwan do: na sɛ muwu a

column2: "Nna Modekai sii mu kɔr no kwan
column3: na ɔkɛyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Ester hyɛɛ no no nyinara."
